mapper.insert: insert into info_turnover_week (stock_code, turnover_week, price_week, extent_week, calculate_date) values ( #{stockCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{turnoverWeek, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{priceWeek, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{extentWeek, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into info_turnover_week (stock_code, turnover_week, price_week, extent_week, calculate_date) values
( #{td.stockCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{td.turnoverWeek, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{td.priceWeek, jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{td.extentWeek, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{td.calculateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
